line.comment: * Cannot claim in the first 15 minutes.
* Cannot claim an already claimed sector.
* ZH 2.0 - cannot claim a sector which is currently being demanded by a faction
* Mordan4 can't claim renegade sector.
* Cannot claim a sector we own.
* Cannot claim if the player did not finish his Ascension (difficulty setting), and that the galaxy expansion is not set to none.
* Herobetty 5.4: Do 1 call to Mayhem.IsGalaxyExpansionNone rather than 2 calls.
* Zero Hour: cannot claim unknown sectors before the first player sector
* during chaotic galaxy start there is no Unknown sector protection
* ZH 2.0 - desired minimum amount of Unknown sectors in galaxy.
* this variable gets updated by 'ZH.Get.UnknownSectorsBelowGoal' each time 'Mayhem.Conquer' is called
* Cannot claim a sector if we have a truce with the owner.
* Cannot claim a sector if we have a coalition with the owner.
* Unclaimable sectors, like the one with the OCV main portal.
* Mordan9
* There is a bug that return owned sector to [Unknown] for some reason. This makes sure that we don't claim again those sectors (very rare bug).
* $outpostType = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.GetOutpostType' : race=$race
* do if find station: sector=$sector class or type=$outpostType race=null flags=0 refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=1 refpos=null
* At this point, Player can claim everything.
* === NPC Only below. ===
* Make sure only main factions can claim $sector.
* when player joins OCV Phanon will only attack him
* ZH 2.0 - buffed Pirate contract perk. Protects against new Yaki claims
* $outpost = find station: sector=$sector class or type={Player Outpost} race=[Player] flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=1 refpos=null
* Mordan9
* Herobetty 5.4: Joining the OCV voids a pirate contract.
* Cannot claim a sector if we have an unbreakable alliance with the owner.
* Cannot claim Xenon sectors if they're weaker than originally. Zero Hour- Except during Global Alliance
* Zero Hour: priority favor action can override this protection for the Xenon
* ** Zone of Control
* Cannot claim Player sectors if the reputation is not bad. Cannot claim unknown sectors adjacent to player either.
* Zero Hour: chance to ignore ZoC
* default: 20 = 2% risk
* no risk on easy difficulty if player is honorable
* infamy increases to 15% + 1% for each point of infamy
* double risk on hard difficulty
* Cannot claim a sector if the owner has less than or equal to X sectors (9972 option).
* Don't claim if we have Pacifism favor.
* Zero Hour AI: -1=full defense ; 0=cautious ; 1=baseline (vanilla Mayhem 3) ; 2=confident ; 3=reckless
* full defense AI cannot claim any sectors
* cautious AI can only claim adjacent sectors
* ZH 2.0 - Phanon can never claim Xenon sectors
* can also not claim player unless he betrayed them
* Mordan4 - NPC's can not claim sectors that were recently abandoned.
* The basic problem, is that as you invade NPC space, wiping out entire sectors as you go in a scorched earth approach,
* the A.I. will quickly 'magically' claim the sector after you move through, forcing you to back up. This is not reasonable or realistic
* since the A.I. dosn't use resources for this. To limit them, we put a timer on it so a sector can not be claimed once Abandoned for X-Hours.
* Player is always allowed to claim.
* If the race that abandoned (or destroyed) the sector isn't the same one trying to claim it
* If it indeed was an abandoned sector, we need to look at the time it was abandoned. It is not claimable (or conquerable)
* for a duration after abandonment. Use a 1 day default if not set in 9973.
* Not working..
* Lets see if this is working.

line.text: 'Race %s tried to claim the recently abandoned sector %s'

line.comment: * Mordan9 - Don't allow A.I. to expand until the player owns X amount of systems. 9973 option. Defaults to 3.
* Herobetty 5.4: Check if galaxy is an origin galaxy. If it is not an origin galaxy AND the player doesn't have X systems, AI is not allowed to expand.

sval.val: Pirate contract
Race %s tried to claim the recently abandoned sector %s
Cannot claim in the first 15 minutes.
Cannot claim an already claimed sector.
ZH 2.0 - cannot claim a sector which is currently being demanded by a faction
Mordan4 can't claim renegade sector.
Cannot claim a sector we own.
Cannot claim if the player did not finish his Ascension (difficulty setting), and that the galaxy expansion is not set to none.
Herobetty 5.4: Do 1 call to Mayhem.IsGalaxyExpansionNone rather than 2 calls.
Zero Hour: cannot claim unknown sectors before the first player sector
during chaotic galaxy start there is no Unknown sector protection
ZH 2.0 - desired minimum amount of Unknown sectors in galaxy.
this variable gets updated by 'ZH.Get.UnknownSectorsBelowGoal' each time 'Mayhem.Conquer' is called
Cannot claim a sector if we have a truce with the owner.
Cannot claim a sector if we have a coalition with the owner.
Unclaimable sectors, like the one with the OCV main portal.
There is a bug that return owned sector to [Unknown] for some reason. This makes sure that we don't claim again those sectors (very rare bug).
$outpostType = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.GetOutpostType' : race=$race
do if find station: sector=$sector class or type=$outpostType race=null flags=0 refobj=null maxdist=0 maxnum=1 refpos=null
At this point, Player can claim everything.
=== NPC Only below. ===
Make sure only main factions can claim $sector.
when player joins OCV Phanon will only attack him
ZH 2.0 - buffed Pirate contract perk. Protects against new Yaki claims
$outpost = find station: sector=$sector class or type={Player Outpost} race=[Player] flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=1 refpos=null
Herobetty 5.4: Joining the OCV voids a pirate contract.
Cannot claim a sector if we have an unbreakable alliance with the owner.
Cannot claim Xenon sectors if they're weaker than originally. Zero Hour- Except during Global Alliance
Zero Hour: priority favor action can override this protection for the Xenon
** Zone of Control
Cannot claim Player sectors if the reputation is not bad. Cannot claim unknown sectors adjacent to player either.
Zero Hour: chance to ignore ZoC
default: 20 = 2% risk
no risk on easy difficulty if player is honorable
infamy increases to 15% + 1% for each point of infamy
double risk on hard difficulty
Cannot claim a sector if the owner has less than or equal to X sectors (9972 option).
Don't claim if we have Pacifism favor.
Zero Hour AI: -1=full defense ; 0=cautious ; 1=baseline (vanilla Mayhem 3) ; 2=confident ; 3=reckless
full defense AI cannot claim any sectors
cautious AI can only claim adjacent sectors
ZH 2.0 - Phanon can never claim Xenon sectors
can also not claim player unless he betrayed them
Mordan4 - NPC's can not claim sectors that were recently abandoned.
The basic problem, is that as you invade NPC space, wiping out entire sectors as you go in a scorched earth approach,
the A.I. will quickly 'magically' claim the sector after you move through, forcing you to back up. This is not reasonable or realistic
since the A.I. dosn't use resources for this. To limit them, we put a timer on it so a sector can not be claimed once Abandoned for X-Hours.
Player is always allowed to claim.
If the race that abandoned (or destroyed) the sector isn't the same one trying to claim it
If it indeed was an abandoned sector, we need to look at the time it was abandoned. It is not claimable (or conquerable)
for a duration after abandonment. Use a 1 day default if not set in 9973.
Not working..
Lets see if this is working.
Mordan9 - Don't allow A.I. to expand until the player owns X amount of systems. 9973 option. Defaults to 3.
Herobetty 5.4: Check if galaxy is an origin galaxy. If it is not an origin galaxy AND the player doesn't have X systems, AI is not allowed to expand.
